thread.section_title: The Yorkshire Soap Company Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of yorkshiresoap.co.uk
thread.title: Tracey L
thread.title_full: The Yorkshire Soap Company reviewed by Tracey L

author: Tracey L
title: Tracey L
text: Fabulous soap - I have very sensitive skin so the botanical soap is perfect. The fragrances are amazing and a bar lasts quite well compared to others used in the past. The gift box with 4 soaps makes a fantastic gift an is excellent value for money. Ordering was easy and the delivery arrived on time. Now I have discovered this soap I will be reordering regularly.
